name: Environmental Science
description: Learn about the environment, sustainability, and human impact on the planet.

concepts.title: Ecosystem Services
concepts.content: Explore the resources and processes nature provides.

concepts.title: Pollution
concepts.content: Understand causes and effects of different types of pollution.

concepts.title: Sustainability
concepts.content: Study practices that support ecological balance.

concepts.title: Climate Action
concepts.content: Examine strategies to combat climate change.
